title.narrative: Moderniz Contraloría Gral de la Rep y Desconc del Sistema Nacional de Control
Moderniz of Controller Gral Office & Deconcent of National Control System
N/A
N/A

description.narrative: Fortalecer las entidades que integran el Sistema Nacional de Control (SNC), a partir de la reforma y actualización de los enfoques y métodos de control, la ampliación de su cobertura y la consolidación del proceso de desconcentración, para elevar la efectividad del control de los recursos públicos, contribuyendo de este modo al mejoramiento de la gobernabilidad democrática del país.

The program's general objective is to support the principles of due process and administrative probity, provide greater protection of the State's assets, and promote public-sector efficiency by modernizing the Office of the Comptroller General of the Republic (CGR) and strengthening and decentralizing the National Control System (NCS). The project's specific objectives are to make control over public funds more effective, reform control approaches and methods, strengthen and decentralize the NCS, encourage a culture of values and promote better coordination among government agencies, society at large and the private sector.
